summary: The 'Ban Harmful Food Dyes Act' (H.R. 5027) aims to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act. It declares food containing specific color additives, including Red No. 40, Red No. 3, Yellow No. 5, and others, as adulterated and unsafe for use in food, effective January 1, 2027. This primarily targets artificial food dyes, impacting the food industry and consumer product safety.
